snippet: Ambassador Eric Goosby, the Obama administration’s global AIDS czar, was named to lead a new Office of Global Health Diplomacy on Friday, the State Department said.
abstract: Ambassador Eric Goosby, Obama administration’s global AIDS czar, is named to lead a new Office of Global Health Diplomacy; he will continue to head Pepfar, President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, which pays for prevention and treatment.
lead_paragraph: Ambassador Eric Goosby, the Obama administration’s global AIDS czar, was named to lead a new Office of Global Health Diplomacy on Friday, the State Department said.

headline.main: New Office in U.S. to Fight AIDS
headline.print_headline: New Office in U.S. to Fight AIDS

keywords.value: President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief
keywords.name: organizations
